bullets.text: Fed withdraws 2023 guidance and issues new policy for Board-supervised banks to support responsible innovation, potentially easing fintech/crypto experimentation under supervision.
First post-shutdown CPI release is a key read on disinflation vs stickiness, shaping near-term rate-cut expectations and risk assets’ sensitivity to surprises.
Mortgage rates rose even after a Fed cut, depressing loan demand—highlighting term-premium/credit-spread dynamics that can blunt monetary easing for households.
Micron forecasts surging revenue as AI-driven memory demand stays strong, reinforcing semis’ AI capex cycle and tight supply supporting pricing power.
AI megacap stocks slide amid valuation and demand fears, signaling higher sensitivity to rates, capex payback timelines, and any slowdown in hyperscaler spending.
Oracle shares drop after Blue Owl exits funding a $10B data center, underscoring financing risk and potential cooling in aggressive AI-infrastructure buildouts.
Instacart faces FTC scrutiny over an AI pricing tool, raising broader regulatory risk for algorithmic pricing and potential limits on automated price discrimination.
Coinbase adds prediction markets and stock trading, accelerating convergence of crypto and traditional brokerage and increasing regulatory and competitive stakes in retail trading platforms.
Trump orders a Venezuela oil-tanker blockade; Venezuela escorts vessels. Oil rebounds, highlighting supply-disruption risk and potential escalation in U.S.-Venezuela tensions.
Canada’s population declines amid tightened immigration, implying weaker labor-force growth and potential drag on GDP, housing demand, and fiscal sustainability.
Coursera agrees to combine with Udemy (~$2.5B), signaling consolidation in online learning as platforms reposition around AI-era workforce upskilling demand.
U.S. plans largest nuclear buildout since the 1970s, potentially boosting grid reliability and decarbonization while intensifying demand for uranium, financing, and supply-chain capacity.
New test may detect Alzheimer’s before symptoms, a potential breakthrough for earlier intervention and a major catalyst for diagnostics markets and trial design.
Google launches Gemini 3 Flash and makes it default, intensifying model competition focused on speed/cost and shaping enterprise inference economics and app-layer adoption.
